list.notApplyingReason: This executor doesn’t want to apply now, but may do in the future (this is also known as power reserved)
This executor doesn’t want to apply now, but may do in the future (this is also known as power reserved)
This executor died (before the person who has died)
This executor died (after the person who has died)

declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.confirm: We confirm that we will administer the estate of DiedFN DiedLN, according to law. We will:
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks us to do so, we will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
declaration.submitWarning: Once everyone has agreed the legal statement and made their declaration, this information can’t be changed.
declaration.understandItem1: our application will be rejected if we do not answer any questions about the information we have given
declaration.understandItem2: criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against us if we are found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest

legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information MainExecutorFN MainExecutorLN has given in their application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.deceased: DiedFN DiedLN was born on 1 January 1900 and died on 2 February 2000, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.applicant: We, MainExecutorFN MainExecutorLN of 126 Caulfield road, Diff Executor2FNLN of 126 Caulfield road and Diff Executor3FNLN of 126 Caulfield road, make the following statement:

executorsApplying.name: MainExecutorFN MainExecutorLN, an executor named in the will or codicils as Diff MainExecutorFNLN, is applying for probate. Their name is different because MainExecutorFN MainExecutorLN: Diff Reason  MainExecutorFNLN.
executorsApplying.sign: MainExecutorFN MainExecutorLN will sign and send to the probate registry what they believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of DiedFN DiedLN.

executorsApplying.name: Diff Executor2FNLN, an executor named in the will or codicils as Executor2FNLN, is applying for probate. Their name is different because Diff Executor2FNLN got married.
executorsApplying.sign: Diff Executor2FNLN will sign a photocopy of what they believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of DiedFN DiedLN. MainExecutorFN MainExecutorLN will send the signed photocopy to the probate registry.

executorsApplying.name: Diff Executor3FNLN, an executor named in the will or codicils as Executor3FNLN, is applying for probate. Their name is different because Diff Executor3FNLN: diff reason Diff Executor3FNLN.
executorsApplying.sign: Diff Executor3FNLN will sign a photocopy of what they believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of DiedFN DiedLN. MainExecutorFN MainExecutorLN will send the signed photocopy to the probate registry.

legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of our knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in DiedFN DiedLN which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of DiedFN DiedLN and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
legalStatement.deceasedOtherNames: They were also known as iff DiedFN Diff DiedLN.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £9000 and the net value for the estate amounts to £8000.
executorsNotApplying: Executor4FNLN, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application but reserves power to do so at a later date. They have been notified in writing.
Executor5FNLN, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application but reserves power to do so at a later date. They have been notified in writing.
Executor6FNLN, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application because they died before DiedFN DiedLN died.
Executor7FNLN, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application because they died after DiedFN DiedLN died.
